Title: Relates to eligibility requirements for the receipt of child care assistance
Summary: Relates to eligibility requirements for the receipt of child care assistance; removes requirement for an individual to work at least 17 1/2 hours per week for families with incomes up to two hundred percent of the state income standard who are attending a post secondary educational program.
LawCode: Amd ยง410-w, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to eligibility requirements for the receipt of child care assistance
